message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.SD 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language): This paper deals with natural language processing and classification of social content written in a mixed language, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks): The paper focuses on analyzing social content on platforms such as Twitter, Reddit, and Facebook, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper utilizes deep learning techniques to tackle the classification problem, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
- cs.CY (Computers and Society): The paper deals with analyzing social content and its impact on society, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
- cs.SD (Software Engineering): The paper utilizes text augmentation techniques to improve the performance of the classifier, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
